caller_intent: The caller needs to change the insurance coverage on two vehicles (a 2019 Cruz and a Silverado) from current coverage to liability-only before making a payment.
resolution_steps: Agent checks the customer's account to review current coverage and premium details.
Identifies that Heather previously worked on the quote but is unavailable, so agent decides to proceed independently.
Calculates new premium after switching both vehicles to liability-only (new total: $793.96, down from $717.64).
Explains that the system needs time to process the change and will update by Monday.
Estimates a partial payment of $426.64 (based on subtracting the $291 credit from the original $717.64) as a temporary solution.
Advises customer to wait until Monday for final confirmation of the updated premium and payment amount.
knowledge_required: Insurance policy adjustments (specifically liability coverage changes)
Premium calculation logic for Auto Owners insurance
System limitations regarding pending updates and grace periods
Customer service protocols for partial payments during policy changes
summary: An agent assists a customer in adjusting their insurance coverage to liability-only on two vehicles. The agent calculates the new premium, explains the need to wait for system updates, and suggests a temporary partial payment. The resolution is pending system processing, with final confirmation expected by Monday.
